new_skill_specs.name: identify_highest_accuracy_model
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify the model with the highest accuracy score at a specific pretrain loss value from a chart.
edge_cases: Multiple models with the same highest accuracy score
Pretrain loss value not clearly marked on the chart

new_skill_specs.name: map_model_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the identified model name to the corresponding option label in a multiple-choice question.
edge_cases: Model name not present in options
Multiple options for the same model name

tests.input: RFT U13B, [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'ICL'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'SFT'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'SFT 1/8'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'RFT k=100'}, {'label': 'E', 'text': 'RFT k=25'}, {'label': 'F', 'text': 'RET k=6'}, {'label': 'G', 'text': 'RFT U13B'}]
